glooptweaks-desc: Provides additional functionality for all wikis across the Weird Gloop network
weirdgloop-copyright: Content on this site is licensed under $1; additional terms may apply.
weirdgloop-upload-nolicenses: Uploading files to this wiki is not enabled. To be able to use this page to upload to this wiki, an administrator needs to add one or more license options to the page [[MediaWiki:Licenses]]. Use the following format: * Template name|Label. Use any text to enable uploading without license options.
weirdgloop-globalblocking-ipblocked:
'''Your IP address has been blocked on all wikis.'''

The block was made by $1 ($2).
The reason given is ''$3''.

* Start of block: $4
* Expiry of block: $5

Your current IP address is $6.
Please include all above details in any queries you make.

If you believe you were blocked by mistake, you can contact an admin using [[Special:Contact]].
weirdgloop-globalblocking-ipblocked-xff:
'''One or more proxy servers used by your request is blocked on all wikis.'''

The block was made by $1 ($2).
The reason given is ''$3''.

* Start of block: $4
* Expiry of block: $5

The blocked proxy address was $6.
Please include all above details in any queries you make.

If you believe you were blocked by mistake, you can contact an admin using [[Special:Contact]]
weirdgloop-torblock-blocked: Your IP address, $1, has been identified as a Tor exit node. Editing through Tor is blocked to prevent abuse. If you believe this is incorrect, you can contact an admin using [[Special:Contact]].
weirdgloop-siteinterface: You cannot perform this action to a global interface page. If this page needs to be edited or for help, [[Special:Contact|contact a system administrator]].
right-sysadmin: Access to administrative tools across the network
